title: I can't play League anymore
body: Whenever I try to play League, going into a queue, it sometimes goes into champion select, then when it gets to my turn it just freezes.  And when I play with someone else, they start the queue and when it finds a match, the accept/decline does not show up on my screen.  I was wondering if someone could help me with this problem?  Thanks!

replies.body: My internet connection is good. And when I go into a custom game then it works. It's only not working when I go into an actual queue that it doesn't work. I was wondering if you could help me?

I can help!  Just to be extra safe, I recommend enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode just to reduce any pc stress caused by the aesthetics during champ select.

Your overall issue sounds like a connection problem, though.  It seems to be struggling in transition to champion select or matchmaking.  It's really important to get this fixed up because constantly missing queue can result in a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  For this specific case, run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up, then test it in a custom.

Let me know if you have any questions!
